tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE baseball_equipment (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   equipment_name VARCHAR(255),
   quantity INT,
   manufacturer VARCHAR(255),
   order_date DATE,
   maintenance_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  equipment_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  technician_id INT,
  maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    equipment_id INT,
    quantity INT,
    order_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);
